knimeNode.name: Formatter to String
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node adds for each column including a format manager another string column containing the formatted value. The column name is the original name followed by ' (formatted)'.

intro.p: This node may be used in workflow tests to assert the output of format manager nodes.
It adds for each column including a format manager another string column containing the formatted value. The column name is the original name followed by ' (formatted)'.
